product_name: REI Expedition-Weight Quarter-Zip Top - Toddler Girls'
long_description: Our warmest thermal top for toddlers, the plush and thick REI Expedition-Weight Quarter-Zip top makes an excellent next-to-skin layer for little girls' winter adventures in extreme cold.
